document.full_text: a car bomb exploded near an office of the country?s premier intelligence agency on tuesday, killing at least 24 people and wounding more than 132, police and emergency officials said.
document.title: car bomb kills at least 24 near spy agency in pakistan
lines_and_colors: a car bomb exploded near an office of the country?s premier intelligence agency on tuesday, killing at least 24 people and wounding more than 132, police and emergency officials said.
